name: GridList
description: An auto-generated grid list that calculate item size according to given props

props.name: numColumns
props.description: Number of items to show in a row (ignored when passing maxItemWidth)

props.name: maxItemWidth
props.description: Allow a responsive item width to the maximum item width

props.name: listPadding
props.description: List padding (used for item size calculation)

props.name: containerWidth
props.description: Pass when you want to use a custom container width for calculation

props.name: keepItemSize
props.description: whether to keep the items initial size when orientation changes, in which case the apt number of columns will be calculated automatically.
